statements.select: select * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo)
select * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo) and customerid=#value#

select * from BomParentPartInfo where (productId = #productid# and CustomerId=#customerid# and #customerid# is not null) or (productId = #productid# and #customerid# is null and ( IsCustomerProcut <>1 or IsCustomerProcut is null ) )
select case when exists( select * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where $value$ ) then 1 else 0 end

SELECT * FROM BomParentPartInfo WHERE (id like '%$bomid$%' or #bomid# is null) and (ProductId IN(SELECT ProductId FROM Product where ( product.id like '%$id$%' or #id# is null) and (ProductName like '%$name$%' or #name# is null) and (CustomerProductName like '%$customerProductName$%' or #customerProductName# is null) ))
select case when exists( SELECT * FROM [dbo].[BomParentPartInfo] where productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo) ) then 1 else 0 end
select top 1 * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo) order by InsertTime
select top 1 * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo) order by InsertTime desc
select top 1 * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo) order by InsertTime
select case when exists( select * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where InsertTime < #InsertTime# and productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo) ) then 1 else 0 end
select case when exists( select * from dbo.BomParentPartInfo where InsertTime > #InsertTime# and productid not in (select productid from dbo.BomComponentInfo)) then 1 else 0 end
